items.title: Second doctor sentenced in Matthew Perry overdose death
items.description: Dr Mark Chavez, one of five people who pleaded guilty in the Friends star's death, was sentenced to eight months of home detention.

items.title: Police release new image as hunt continues for gunman in Brown University shooting
items.description: Two people died and nine others were injured in the attack in Rhode Island on Saturday.

items.title: Vanity Fair story that bashed Vance and Musk lacked context, Trump chief of staff says
items.description: In the interview, Wiles describes Donald Trump as having an "alcoholic's personality" and JD Vance as having been a "conspiracy theorist" for a decade...

items.title: EU waters down plans to end new petrol and diesel car sales by 2035
items.description: Carmakers, particularly in Germany, have lobbied heavily for concessions to the planned rules.

items.title: US designates Colombian cocaine gang a terrorist group
items.description: The move is seen as a further escalation of the Trump administration's war on drugs in Latin America.
